summary: Replaces the Bethesda Intro at the start of the game with a 2min long Cinematic trailer from Witcher 3, namely "Killing Monsters".
descriptionHtml:
READ: The intro is about 2min long which is unskippable so if you want to use this, back up your video folder incase you get tired of the length, or install a different replacer. Alternatively what I have found to be working as an "intro skip" is alt-tabbing out pf the game to a different window and then back in.

Installation:
Drag the Video folder into your Skyrim/Data directory(where you normally place your mods)

Then open up your Skyrim.ini and either add or change sIntroSequence= to sIntroSequence=New_IntroAndSound720.bik

And DONE!

Credit:
Bugthesda for Skyrim

CD Projekt Red for Witcher Franchise
author: Mad Trump
